Title: Clarifies the timeline and details needed for child protective services to declare whether a report is "indicated" or "unfounded"
Summary: Clarifies the timeline and details needed for child protective services to declare whether a report is "indicated" or "unfounded" including examining past family history.
LawCode: Amd ยง424, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to clarifying when and how a child protective services report is determined
